activities:
Hilton receives Employee personal data from the European Union and Switzerland for Hilton’s global recruitment functions; to engage in human resources management and administration; and to monitor compliance with applicable laws, policies and procedures.

Hilton receives Customer personal data from the European Union and Switzerland to provide the services requested by the Customer, or which are part of a program the Customer has joined or a purchase the Customer has made, such as to facilitate: reservations; hotel stays; membership in the HHonors program; and other transactions. Hilton also uses the personal data to provide marketing information on products and services and to conduct surveys.
